about_the_game:
Step into the paws of a curious cat in this charming, nature-inspired adventure!
Explore three colorful worlds, each of them being different.

Your feline hero loves to jump, catch birds and navigate the environment with agility, all while evading obstacles, animals and solving simple puzzles along the way.

It's a relaxing and fun game, full of charm and surprises!

Features:

- Simple & intuitive gameplay
- Cute birds and animals
- Colorful and charming graphics
- Three different Worlds each having 10 levels
- Cat skins to customize your character
- Steam achievements
- Beautiful music

name: Kitty Loves Birds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Play as a curious cat exploring a colorful world in nature. Jump, catch birds, evade obstacles and animals, and solve simple puzzles in this charming adventure!
